text: 🚨New Report: America's Healthcare Affordability Crisis! 💸🏥 Did you know? 🤔 Americans struggle to afford healthcare! 😱 Average max monthly payment: $97! 💸 Many skip preventive care, meds, mental health, and diagnostic testing! 🤯 We need solutions NOW! 🌟 @PayZen is on a mission to tackle this crisis with AI-powered tech! 🚀 Let's make healthcare affordable for all! 💖
